channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Crowd yells ‘cowards!’ after federal agents crash into a car and fire tear gas in Minneapolis
item.description: Federal officers in Minneapolis have fired tear gas to break up a crowd of whistle-blowing bystanders who showed up to see the aftermath of a car crash involving immigration agents.

item.title: George Floyd and Renee Good: 5 years between Minneapolis videos, and confusion has increased
Thousands of nurses go on strike at several major New York City hospitals
